info.title: Traffic Court Online Citizen Api
info.description: An API for creating violation ticket disputes

get.summary:
Gets autocomplete results
Find addresses matching the search term.

Gets autocomplete retrieve result
Returns the full address details based on the Id.

post.summary: An endpoint for creating and saving dispute ticket data

get.summary: Returns a list of Violation Ticket Statutes filtered by given section text (if provided).

parameters.name: section
parameters.description: Motor vehicle act Section text to query by, ie "13(1)(a)" returns "Motor Vehicle or Trailer without Licence" contravention, or blank for no filter.

get.summary: Searches for a violation ticket that exists on file.

parameters.name: ticketNumber
parameters.description: The violation ticket number. Must start with two upper case letters and end with eight digits.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: The time the violation ticket number was issued. Must be formatted a valid 24-hour clock, HH:MM.

404.description: The violation ticket was not found.

500.description: There was a server error that prevented the search from completing successfully.

400.description: The request was not well formed. Check the parameters.

get.summary: Searches for a violation ticket that exists on file.

parameters.name: ticketNumber
parameters.description: The violation ticket number. Must start with two upper case letters and end with eight digits.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: The time the violation ticket number was issued. Must be formatted a valid 24-hour clock, HH:MM.

404.description: The violation ticket was not found.

500.description: There was a server error that prevented the search from completing successfully.

400.description: The request was not well formed. Check the parameters.

post.summary: Analyses a Traffic Violation Ticket, extracting all hand-written text to a consumable JSON object.

200.description: The file appears to be a valid Violation Ticket. JSON data is extracted.

400.description:
The uploaded file is too large or the Violation Ticket does not appear to be valid. Either 
            the ticket title could not be found, the ticket number is invalid, the violation date is invalid or more than 
            30 days ago, or MVA is not selected or not the only ACT selected.

validationErrors.description: A list of field-specific reasons why the field Confidence may be low

imageFilename.description: Gets or sets the saved image filename.

globalConfidence.description:
A global confidence of correctly extracting the document. This value will be low if the title of this 
Violation Ticket form is not found (or of low confidence itself) or if the main ticket number is missing or invalid.

fields.description: An enumeration of all fields in this Violation Ticket.

OcrViolationTicket.description: A model representation of the extracted OCR results.

Statute.description: A Statute is a Violation Ticket Fine Regulation as dictated by the BC Government.

ticketedAmount.description: The ticketed amount for this offence.

violationTicketNumber.description: The violation ticket number. This will match the ticket number searched for.

violationDate.description: The date the violation ticket was issued.

violationTime.description: The time of day the violation ticket was issued. This will match the time searched for.

offences.description: The list of offences on this violation ticket.

TicketSearchResult.description: Obsolete: Represents a violation ticket that is returned from search requests

given_names.description: The given names or corporate name continued.

is_young_person.description: The person issued the ticket has been identified as a young person.

drivers_licence_number.description: The drivers licence number. Note not all jurisdictions will use numeric drivers licence numbers.

drivers_licence_province.description: The province or state the drivers licence was issued by.

drivers_licence_produced_year.description: The year the drivers licence was produced.

drivers_licence_expiry_year.description: The year the drivers licence expires.

birthdate.description: The birthdate of the individual the violation ticket was issued to.

address.description: The address of the individual the violation ticket was issued to.

city.description: The city of the individual the violation ticket was issued to.

province.description: The province or state of the individual the violation ticket was issued to.

postal_code.description: The postal code or zip code.

is_change_of_address.description:
The address represents a change of address. The address on the violation would be different from the address 
on the drivers licence or provided identification.

is_driver.description: The enforcement officer says that he or she has reasonable grounds to believe, and does believe, that the above named as the vehicle driver.

is_cyclist.description: The enforcement officer says that he or she has reasonable grounds to believe, and does believe, that the above named as the cyclist.

is_owner.description: The enforcement officer says that he or she has reasonable grounds to believe, and does believe, that the above named as the vehicle owner.

is_pedestrain.description: The enforcement officer says that he or she has reasonable grounds to believe, and does believe, that the above named as a pedestrain.

is_passenger.description: The enforcement officer says that he or she has reasonable grounds to believe, and does believe, that the above named as a passenger.

is_other.description: The enforcement officer says that he or she has reasonable grounds to believe, and does believe, that the above named as a other designation.

other_description.description: If TrafficCourts.Citizen.Service.Models.Tickets.ViolationTicket.IssuedToOther is true, the other designation description.

issued_date.description: The date and time the violation ticket was issue. Time must only be hours and minutes.

issued_on_road_or_highway.description: The violation ticket was issued on this road or highway.

issued_at_or_near_city.description: The violation ticket was issued at or near this city or town.

is_mva_offence.description: The violation ticket was issued for offence under the Motor Vehicle Act (MVA).

is_wla_offence.description: The violation ticket was issued for offence under the Wildlife Act (WLA).

is_lca_offence.description: The violation ticket was issued for offence under the Liquor Control and Licencing Act (LCA).

is_mca_offence.description: The violation ticket was issued for offence under the Motor Carrier Act (MCA).

is_faa_offence.description: The violation ticket was issued for offence under the Firearm Act (FAA).

is_tcr_offence.description: The violation ticket was issued for offence under the Transit Conduct and Safety Regs (TCR).

is_cta_offence.description: The violation ticket was issued for offence under the Commercial Transport Act (CTA).

is_other_offence.description: The violation ticket was issued for other.

other_offence_description.description: The violation ticket was issued for other.

counts.description: Represents the counts identified. Must have at least one and at most three counts.

provincial_court_hearing_location.description: The designated provincial court hearing location. For example, Richmond, BC.

organization_location.description: The organization or detatchment location. For example, Delta Police.

ViolationTicket.description: Represents the data contained on a BC violation ticket

count.description: The count number. Must be unique within an individual violation ticket.

act_or_regulation.description: The act or regulation code the violation occurred against. For example, MVA, WLA, TCR, etc

section.description: The full section designation of the act or regulation. For example, "147(1)" which means "Speed in school zone"

amount_due.description: The amount due. Will be the same as ticketed_amount if no payments have been made on the ticket. May or may not have discount computed.

is_act.description: The count is flagged as an offence to an act. Cannot be true, if is_regulation is true.

is_regulation.description: The count is flagged as an offence to a regulation. Cannot be true, if is_act is true.
